resources.string: You need to set the current account before performing this operation. Please consult the documentation for proper usage.
In order to use the Nextcloud Single Sign On on this device, you need to grant permission to access your accounts
Provided authentication token does not match or package name is not permitted to perform this action
This app depends on the Nextcloud Files app. Please install it in order to use this app.
The requested account was not found in Nextcloud Files app
The account %1$s was not found in Nextcloud Files app
You have to accept the requested permissions to use the Single Sign On feature.
HTTP request failed with HTTP status-code: %1$d
In order to continue please install the Nextcloud Files app on your device first.
Your Nextcloud Files app is an older version which does not yet support the Single Sign On feature.

Nextcloud Files app API is not responding. This is most likely due to battery optimizations on your phone. Try to disable the battery optimization for both apps (Nextcloud Files and this app). In all other cases please try to clear the storage of both apps.
SSO import was cancelled by user
